title: SolrCLI masks underlying cause of create collection failure.
description: Something wonky with my network caused an error during collection creation but the SolrCLI reported the collection already existed, which is misleading and hides the actual cause. The error handling needs to be fixed.

comments.author: Timothy Potter
comments.content: Patch fixes bad error handling code in SolrCLI
